main.name: Muhamad Sahid
main.jobDescription: Brainstorm Ideas, Design Protoype, & Slap My Keyboard Until Everything Works
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for the logic and sciense, curious to learn how everything works, a passion for coding. Born in a south west sydeny, alongside my many ongoing projects. I love to create and tend to keep a few too many projects on the go at a time. Outside of work I am an avid thrill seeker, hiking and seeking new goals to accomplish. I love to travel and lead a fairly spontaneous lifestyle. As show are some client work i've done in my early stages as a programmer.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description:
Here I took my Bachelors degree achieved a much more thorough education. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile). I was given the opportunity:
  • UOW ambassador
  • President & Founder of 3 Society
  • Student Succes Mentor
  • In2Uni Mentor
  • Advisor UniLife - Supporting Engagment in campus
'

I took place in a remote learning to become a full stack developer through javascript frame works every week would be demonstrate a project on concept we leared, As showcased on my github and on this portfolio of real client work.

I took place in a global summer school internship among 13 countries, being nomintated team leader in a mix team of non-english speakers building an application using BootStrap, CSS, Javascript, MYSQL. Placing 3rd place out of 12 teams.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Mulitiple clients, in the humaintarian aid sector. Using bootstrap, css, javascript .

work.title: Full Stack Developer - contractor
work.description:
Building an audit application for a Non-For-Profit Organisation in ensure maximum productivity in all aspect of the organsation to ensure right resoruces are allocated correctly. Features are such to ensuring correct auditing and record keeping is efficent. 

 I was given the opportunity to build the whole application, in conducting everything i learned from both degress, insuring stakeholders wireframe designs and working prototype using figma.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: GitHub is a code hosting platform for version control and collaboration. It lets you and others work together on projects from anywhere. I use Git for all my projects so far

skills.name: Javascript
skills.description: Javascript is my first programming language that I started using in university. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and felt really overwhelmed at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward.

skills.name: Handlebar JS
skills.description: I learned Handlebars before i got into react. Handlebars. js is a Javascript library used to create reusable webpage templates, As demonstrated on a project called bookness.

skills.name: Node JS and Express JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice.

skills.name: Bootstrap 5
skills.description: Bootstrap has been my default layout style for website. But learning Sematic UI React to keep up with competition

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced. However, i enjoyable working with MongoDB

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: During covid Heroku became my hosting platform for most of my projects, due to Heroku being free.

testimonials.text: Muhamad was the right fit to enhance the next step of my organisation. Due to the large following in 4 different countries, having our own website, we're able to ensure we can seperate our social media present but have the website as a step of professionalism. Muhamad has taken me through every step of the way. Thank you Muhamad for your effort knowledge and ensuring we get the best layout.
testimonials.user: Mudah  - CEO Voice Of The Ummah
